title: Digital Marketing Specialist
job_overview:
???? Overview
We are a fast-growing company seeking a creative, resourceful, and tech-savvy Digital Marketing Assistant to join our team. This role is ideal for someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment, is experienced in using AI tools for marketing productivity, and is passionate about driving brand visibility and engagement across various platforms.

???? What We’re Looking For
Proven digital marketing experience (2+ years preferred)

Proficiency with AI tools such as ChatGPT, Jasper, Copy.ai, Midjourney, or others for content creation and automation

Strong graphic design ability using Canva

Excellent written and spoken English communication skills

Organized, proactive, and able to work independently

Familiarity with social media engagement best practices and email marketing tools (like Mailchimp, Klaviyo, or similar)

???? Key Responsibilities
???? Email Marketing (Kanva or Similar Tools)
Plan, source, and create email marketing campaigns aligned with our brand goals

Write engaging and conversion-optimized email copy

Manage contact lists and segment audiences for better targeting

???? Social Media Management
Design and implement a monthly content calendar

Create and schedule posts on Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn

Engage with followers, respond to comments/messages

Conduct outreach and engagement activities to increase visibility and followers

???? Canva Design & Marketing Collateral
Use Canva to create visually appealing marketing materials, including flyers, banners, social graphics, and digital ads

Maintain brand consistency across all visuals

????? Administrative and Remarketing Tasks
Research and collect customer contact information from existing databases and external sources

Support remarketing efforts with organized contact tracking

Assist with analytics and reporting to improve campaign performance

?? Tools You Should Know (or Be Willing to Learn Quickly)
Canva

ChatGPT, Copy.ai, or other AI writing tools

Mailchimp, Klaviyo, or similar email platforms

Meta Business Suite, LinkedIn, Instagram

Google Sheets / Excel

Trello or similar project management tools

???? Why Join Us?
Work with a supportive and innovative team

Opportunities to grow in AI-driven marketing strategies

Long-term position with performance-based raises and bonuses

Flexibility and independence – your ideas are valued!

???? How to Apply
Please send:

Your updated resume

A short cover letter explaining why you're a great fit

Samples of your work (email campaigns, social media posts, Canva graphics, or AI-generated content)

Your OnlineJobs.ph profile link

We’re excited to work with someone creative, self-directed, and ready to grow with our company. If you love marketing and are skilled at using technology to streamline your workflow, we want to hear from you!
